metadata.title: CVE-2017-15134 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A stack buffer overflow flaw was found in the way 389-ds-base 1.3.6.xbefore 1.3.6.13, 1.3.7.x before 1.3.7.9, 1.4.x before 1.4.0.5 handledcertain LDAP search filters. A remote, unauthenticated attacker couldpotentially use this flaw to make ns-slapd crash via a specially craftedLDAP request, thus resulting in denial of service.

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
